Name: そこへ向かう(GO THERE)
About the game: A short action game that the girl go ”There” 'GO THERE' is a side-scrolling action game with a short, wordless story. The story begins when a girl who desperately wants to go 'There' finally comes close to 'There'. Various large dragons live 'There' and block the way of the girl. There aren't many obstacles along the way, but the dragons will make the path difficult. The girl fights the dragon with forward rolls, jumps, and a wand that controls the dragon. Even if she is attacked by a dragon, she can heal herself with magic that heals wounds. The wand to control dragons If the girl wins the battle, she can control the dragon with the power of her wand. The controlled dragons will fight at her signal and protect her when she's stuck, but she's never controlled a dragon before. BGM : MaouDamashii, SKIPMORE, Ichthyostego
